pr_title: Fail Semgrep rules tests on exit != 0

timeline.message: Fail Semgrep rules tests on exit != 0

timeline.bodyText:
Particularly this one. Without the --config argument this gives:
$ python -m semgrep --validate  ~/r2c/semgrep-rules/
No config given and .semgrep.yml was not found. Try running with --help to debug or if you want to download a default config, try running with --config r2c

Since we were only doing check_output we weren't alerted to this issue.
